```{r vectors, fig.cap="Schematic representation of topic vectors for party communication and news articles.", fig.width=6, fig.height=4}

data.frame(
  item = c("News Article", "Party A", "Party B",
            "News Article", "Party A", "Party B"),
  dim1 = c(0,  0.2, 0.8,
            0,0,0),
  dim2 = c(1, 0.8, 0.2,
            0,0,0)
) %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = dim1, y = dim2, 
        color = item, linetype = item)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  xlab("Attention to Consideration 1") +
  ylab("Attention to Consideration 2") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())

```
